short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Correct My Text' extension uses ‘OpenAI’ technology to grammatically correct your text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Correct My Text' extension uses ‘OpenAI’ technology to grammatically correct your text. The user of this tool can upload any text file to check the grammar. The correct grammatical text is displayed in a separate text area using OpenAI technology. The user can e-mail, print and download and even listen to the corrected text.
